Today in County Sligo, expect fun conditions with 5 ft @9s N swell and fresh 16 mph N wind. Good spots like Dunmoran Strand and Easkey Right are working well, especially during their tide windows. Tomorrow, the swell drops slightly to 4 ft @8s NNW with lighter 8 mph S winds, making it a cleaner day overall. The day after holds steady at 5 ft @8s NNW with moderate 13 mph NNW winds, keeping it workable at sheltered corners. Best: tomorrow.
